name: False Alarm
description:
Welcome aboard the S.S. Shmenterprise. You're on your way to the beautiful planet Mirapoluskeld, where you'll finally be free of all your responsibilities. 

You're the only one up here, alone in the endless vacuum of space, but that's okay! Because the Schmenterprise is the best spaceship that science can buy, the pinnacle of gotta blast technology, and the safest place in the observable universe.

There's only one catch.

Meet the team:

  • Natasha Badami, Programming @nbadami
  • Ahmad Faiyaz, Audio 
  • Musa Haydar, Programming @musahaydar
  • Dilan Huang, Art
  • Valerie Matula, Art @vamalama
  • Kaavya Ramachandhran, Art/Programming @kapitha
  • Naveen Sabharwal, Art/Programming @navelsaber
  • Emily Sulkey, Audio @esulkey
  • Lucy Zhang, Art @vboop
